name: Spelly Cat
description:
Your owner has been captured by vile fiends and thrown into a cell at the bottom of the castle ... and they left without feeding you!

Navigate you way through dungeons - casting spells by solving clues and unjumbling words to reach the exit.

The levels can be solved with or without clues and anagrams - or in codeword style where every letter has been replaced by a number.  There is also an adventure mode in development.

Currently there is one level included but any Crossword in .puz format can be loaded in.   I have also included the .puz for this level so it can be solved in other online programs.

Crossword Mode - solve the current clue then use directional keys to move through the level.

Can also be solved like a regular crossword using Tab/Shift Tab to move between clues.

Code Word Mode - Click a cell then type or click a letter to fill all corresponding numbers with that letter

This is a submission for the Crossword Dungeon Game Jam

https://itch.io/jam/crossword-dungeon
